info.title: Lost & Found API
info.description: API for Lost & Found matching system with Domain-Driven Design architecture

post.description:
Create a new report.

This endpoint allows authenticated users to create a new lost or found item report.
The report will be created with PENDING status and requires admin approval.

get.description:
Search reports with various filters.

Supports text search, location-based search, and various filters.
Results are paginated and only include approved reports.
Test endpoint that returns mock data to verify mobile app connectivity.

Get a specific report by ID.

Users can view their own reports regardless of status, and approved reports from others.

put.description:
Update an existing report.

Users can only update their own reports. Some fields may have restrictions
based on the current report status.

delete.description:
Delete a report (soft delete).

Users can only delete their own reports. This performs a soft delete
by setting the status to 'removed'.

get.description:
Get current user's reports.

Returns all reports created by the authenticated user, regardless of status.

schema.title: Response Get My Reports V1 Reports Reports User My Reports Get

get.description:
Get reports near a specific location.

Returns approved reports within the specified radius of the given coordinates.
Useful for map-based interfaces and location-aware searches.

schema.title: Response Get Nearby Reports V1 Reports Reports Nearby Get

get.description:
Get comprehensive report statistics.

Returns aggregated statistics about reports including counts by type,
status, location, and other metrics. Useful for dashboards and analytics.

post.description:
Approve a pending report (Admin only).

This endpoint is restricted to admin users and changes the report
status from PENDING to APPROVED.

get.description:
Get matches for the current user.

This endpoint returns matches where the user's reports are involved.
Get a specific match by ID.

post.description: Promote a match to confirmed status.

get.description: Get current user's profile information.
Get a specific user's public profile.
Get media file information.
Get all active categories.
Get all active colors.

post.description: Refresh access token using refresh token.

get.description: Get current user information.

Comprehensive health check for all system components.

Returns detailed status of:
- API service
- Database (PostgreSQL + pgvector)
- Redis cache
- NLP service
- Vision service

Kubernetes-style readiness probe.
Returns 200 if service is ready to accept requests.

Kubernetes-style liveness probe.
Returns 200 if service is alive (not deadlocked).

Kubernetes-style startup probe.
Returns 200 when service has fully started.

Mobile sync endpoint for offline support.
Returns all data changed since last sync.

schema.title: Response Mobile Sync V1 Mobile Sync Get

post.description:
Quick report creation optimized for mobile.
Simplified validation and faster processing.

get.description: Get reports near user location for mobile map view.

schema.title: Response Get Nearby Reports V1 Mobile Reports Nearby Get

get.description: Get pending matches for mobile app.

schema.title: Response Get Pending Matches V1 Mobile Matches Pending Get

post.description: Respond to a match (accept or decline).

get.description: Get user statistics for mobile dashboard.

schema.title: Response Get Mobile Stats V1 Mobile Stats Get

get.description: Get CSRF token for admin operations.
Aggregate statistics for dashboard cards.
Return daily counts of created and resolved reports.
Return recent audit log entries with user details.
Return coarse-grained health information for dependent services.
Return paginated list of users with optional filters.
Return aggregate statistics for users.
Return user details with aggregate stats.

patch.description: Update mutable fields for a user.

delete.description: Soft delete a user by disabling the account.

post.description: Temporarily suspend a user (keeps account inactive).
Activate a suspended or inactive user.

get.description: List reports for moderation with filtering and pagination.
Aggregate report statistics by status and type.
Return a single report with details.

delete.description: Soft delete a report by marking it removed.

post.description: Reject (hide) a report that violates guidelines.

patch.description: Generic status update endpoint to support admin UI.

post.description: Soft delete a batch of reports.

get.description: Return paginated matches with optional filtering.
Return detailed information for a match.
Aggregate match statistics for dashboard cards.

patch.description: Update the moderation status for a match.

post.description: Approve multiple matches at once (promote them).
Reject multiple matches at once (suppress them).
Trigger match generation for a specific report (not yet implemented).

get.description: List audit logs with pagination and filters.
Display audit log with filters.

post.description: Delete multiple reports at once (soft delete by setting status to REMOVED).
Delete multiple users at once (soft delete by deactivating).

get.description: Health check endpoint with comprehensive service status.
Health check endpoint (v1 API version).
Root endpoint.
